root_causes: The script omits any checks for sub-question B5ex5_4 (the open-text item) though B5ex5_4 is present in the expected sub_questions and referenced in the ValidationCode.
The expected ValidationCode (validateB5d("S7_5","B5ex5_4","hDUMB5eCol5_2","B5eDKx5")) is not implemented or replicated; any rules that function enforces (related to B5ex5_4 or S7_5) are missing.
instructions: Add validation logic for B5ex5_4. At minimum implement the unexpected-non-missing check for B5ex5_4 when the column is hidden (hDUMB5eCol5_2 indicates hidden) or when DK (B5eDKx5=1), similar to the checks already present for B5ex5_1..3: sel if ((b5col5_vis = 0 OR (NOT MISSING(B5eDKx5) AND B5eDKx5 = 1)) AND NOT MISSING(B5ex5_4)).

Implement (or call) the validateB5d logic referenced in ValidationCode: validateB5d("S7_5","B5ex5_4","hDUMB5eCol5_2","B5eDKx5"). If the project expects specific behaviours (e.g., require B5ex5_4 under certain S7_5 conditions, or require it when certain numeric fields have values), replicate those exact checks in SPSS. If a helper routine exists, call it; otherwise translate its rules into explicit sel/compute/list checks.

If B5ex5_4 has any format/length constraints (open-text validation) or is involved in cross-field requirements, add those checks. Keep numeric-only checks (range, precision, arithmetic) limited to numeric sub-questions B5ex5_1..B5ex5_3 as already implemented.
After adding B5ex5_4 checks, re-run the full set of logic to ensure consistency with existing special-code (97,98,99) and DK (B5eDKx5) handling and column-visibility (hDUMB5eCol5_2) assumptions.
